Package control

This package is responsible to the response different actions in the game.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Control
    This class contains the main logic of the game.
    Food_Drink
    This class contains the handles the different objects of the game.
    GameSettings
    lorem ipsum...
    GameState
    This Calss contains every data releated to the game.
    GameTimer
    This calss has to schedule the whole game.
    GuiTimer
    This class run the gui in its own thread.
    Main
    This calls will instantiation the Gamestate and manage the main flow of the game.
    Player
    The player represents the object, which has to catch the different falling object.
    Position
    This class represents a normal position of an object in X,Y coordinate system.
    Stats
    This class manages the game statistics, It stores both local end global stats into one file.
